price: Yã ku waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Ku karɓa wa Allah, kuma ku karɓa wa Manzo, idan Ya kirãye ku zuwa ga abin da Yake rãyar da ku; Kuma ku sani cẽwa Allah Yanã shãmakacẽwa a tsakãnin mutum da zũciyarsa, kuma lalle ne Shĩ, a zuwa gare Shi ake tãra ku.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'tajībū lillahi walilrrasūli idhā daʿākum limā yuḥ'yīkum wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha yaḥūlu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
